data.name: Modelling.Properties
data.label: Modelling Mode
data.info: In the modelling mode you can change dimensions or features of objects

data.name: Accumulating.Faces
data.label: Accumulating faces
data.info: In accumulation mode, you can add more faces to the collection and do something with the collection as a whole

data.name: Accumulating.Faces.List
data.label: List of faces ({0})
data.info: List of already accumulated faces

data.name: MenuId.GeneralModifications
data.label: General modifications of this object
data.info: Move, rotate, reflect, scale, copy or delete this object

data.name: Mate.Mode
data.label: Orientation
data.info: Mate from inside or outside

data.name: Mate.Target
data.label: Target face
data.info: Face onto which will be mated

data.name: MenuId.Edge
data.label: Edge
data.info: submenu for the edge

data.name: MenuId.Face
data.label: Face
data.info: submenu for the face

data.name: MenuId.Shell
data.label: Shell
data.info: submenu for the shell

data.name: MenuId.Solid
data.label: Solid
data.info: submenu for the solid

data.name: MenuId.Solid.RemoveFrom
data.label: Subtract from Solid (Specify)
data.info: This solid will be subtracted from another solid you will specify in the next step

data.name: MenuId.Solid.RemoveFromAll
data.label: Subtract from Overlapping
data.info: Subtracts this solid from all overlapping or intersecting solids

data.name: MenuId.Solid.RemoveAll
data.label: Subtract Overlapping
data.info: Subtracts all overlapping or intersecting solids from this solid

data.name: MenuId.Solid.UniteWithAll
data.label: Unite with overlapping
data.info: Unites this solid with all overlapping or intersecting solids into a single body

data.name: MenuId.Solid.UniteAll
data.label: Unite all overlapping [[V]]
data.info: Unites all solids that touch or overlap.

data.name: MenuId.Solid.IntersectWith
data.label: Intersect with Overlapping
data.info: Creates a new solid from the overlapping volume of this solid and all intersecting solids

data.name: MenuId.Solid.IntersectWithAll
data.label: Intersect with overlapping
data.info: Creates a new solid from the intersection of this solid with all overlapping or touching solids.

data.name: MenuId.Solid.SplitWith
data.label: Split with Solid (Specify)
data.info: Splits this solids with a solid to specify into separate parts, creating individual bodies for the overlapping and non-overlapping regions

data.name: MenuId.Solid.SplitWithAll
data.label: Split with overlapping
data.info: Splits intersecting solids into separate parts, creating individual bodies for the overlapping and non-overlapping regions

data.name: MenuId.Parametrics.Cylinder.Radius
data.label: Change radius
data.info: Change radius of cylindrical features

data.name: MenuId.Parametrics.Cylinder.Diameter
data.label: Change diameter
data.info: Change diameter of cylindrical features

data.name: Constr.Parametrics.Cylinder.Radius
data.label: Change radius
data.info: Change radius of cylindrical features

data.name: Constr.Parametrics.Cylinder.Diameter
data.label: Change diameter
data.info: Change diameter of cylindrical features

data.name: Parametrics.Cylinder.Radius
data.label: Radius
data.info: Change radius of this feature

data.name: Parametrics.Cylinder.Diameter
data.label: Diameter
data.info: Change diameter of this feature

data.name: Parametrics.AssociateParametric
data.label: Use as parameter for the solid

data.name: Parametrics.ParametricsName
data.label: Name
data.info: Name for the parameter. If provided, this will be a property of the solid

data.name: Parametrics.PreserveValue
data.label: Preserve Value
data.info: If enabled, the parameter's value will remain unchanged when other parameters of the solid are modified

data.name: MenuId.ParametricProperty.Preserve
data.label: Preserve Value
data.info: If enabled, the parameter's value will remain unchanged when other parameters of the solid are modified

data.name: MenuId.Export.Solid
data.label: Export STL or STEP file [[E]]
data.info: Export this Solid in the STL or STEP file format

data.name: MenuId.Debug
data.label: Debug
data.info: Debug

data.name: MenuId.Feature.CopyToClipboard
data.label: Copy to clipboard [[cC]]
data.info: Copy the feature to the clipboard for later use.

data.name: MenuId.Feature.Split
data.label: Split Feature
data.info: Split the feature from the solid or make the cutout to a solid

data.name: MenuId.Solid.SplitByPlane
data.label: Split solid by plane
data.info: Split the solid into two or more parts using a specified plane.

data.name: MenuId.FaceAngle
data.label: Angle between faces
data.info: Change the angle between two faces.

data.name: MenuId.Center
data.label: Center
data.info: Center this face between two other faces or edges.

data.name: MenuId.FaceDistanceTo
data.label: Distance to another face
data.info: Set the distance to another face to be selected.

data.name: MenuId.Gauge
data.label: Gauge (Thickness)
data.info: Change gauge of the solid

data.name: MenuId.ParametricProperty.Remove
data.label: Remove property
data.info: Remove this parametric property from the shell

data.name: Solid.ParametricProperties
data.label: Parametrics
data.info: The parametric entries of the shell

data.name: MenuId.FaceDistance
data.label: Distance to Face
data.info: Distance to another face

data.name: Accumulating.Stop
data.label: Stop accumulating [[Esc]]
data.info: Stop selecting further faces/edges; return to normal selection mode.

data.name: MenuId.ExtrudeFace
data.label: Extrude face
data.info: Extrude the selected face.

data.name: MenuId.Mate
data.label: Mate
data.info: Bring this face into coincidence with another face.

data.name: MenuId.FacesAngle
data.label: Angle between faces
data.info: Change the angle between faces.

data.name: Parametrics.InvalidPropertyValue
data.label: Ensure the value is within valid limits to maintain design integrity

data.name: MenuId.ExtrusionLength
data.label: Dimension
data.info: Set the length or width dimension of an extrusion in this direction

data.name: Extrude.Distance
data.label: Extrusion Dimension
data.info: Set the length or width dimension of an extrusion in this direction

data.name: Extrude.MeassureForwardObject
data.label: Measure to
data.info: Measure to this object

data.name: Extrude.MeassureBackwardObject
data.label: Measure from
data.info: Measure from this object

data.name: Vertex.Displayname
data.label: Vertex
data.info: A vertex of this shape

data.name: Edge.Displayname
data.label: Edge
data.info: An edge of this shape

data.name: Face.Displayname
data.label: Face
data.info: A face of this shape

data.name: Constr.Parametrics.Center
data.label: Center objects
data.info: Center objects between two faces, edges, or points.

data.name: Center.FacesToCenter
data.label: Faces to center
data.info: These faces will be centered.

data.name: Center.CenterOnToFirst
data.label: One side of the boundary
data.info: The boundary used for centering.

data.name: Center.CenterOnToSecond
data.label: Other side of the boundary
data.info: The boundary used for centering.

data.name: Center.Ratio
data.label: Ratio
data.info: The ratio between the first and second boundary. 0.5 is in the middle.

data.name: Constr.Parametrics.BrepMove
data.label: Distance to another face
data.info: The distance to another face, edge, or vertex.

data.name: MenuId.Solid.PlaneIntersetionPath
data.label: Intersection curves with a plane
data.info: Create paths from the intersection of this solid with a plane.

data.info: Actions for multiple edges.

data.name: MultipleCurves.Properties

data.info: Actions for multiple curves.

data.label: {0} faces
data.info: Actions for multiple faces.

data.name: MultipleSolids.Properties
data.label: {0} solids
data.info: Actions for multiple solids.

data.name: MenuId.EdgesToCurves
data.label: Convert edges to curves
data.info: Convert the edges to curves and add them to the project.

data.name: MenuId.offsetSolid
data.label: Offset solid
data.info: Expand or shrink the solid by a distance in all directions.

data.name: Construct.OffsetSolid
data.label: Expand/Shrink
data.info: Expand or shrink the solid by a distance in all directions.

data.name: OffsetSolid.Distance
data.label: Offset
data.info: Amount by which the solid should be expanded (+) or shrunk (-).

data.name: UserInterface
data.label: User Interface
data.info: Settings for the user interface (0 is default).

data.name: ToolbarButtonSize
data.label: Toolbar button size
data.info: Size of toolbar buttons; 0 is default.

data.name: MenuSize
data.label: Menu size
data.info: Size of menus; 0 is default.

data.name: Object.Properties
data.label: Properties
data.info: The geometric properties and attributes of this object.

data.name: Message.DestroySolid
data.label: Deleting the face will convert the solid to a shell. Do you really want to delete the face?

data.name: SelectSolid.Solid
data.label: Other solid
data.info: Click the other solid for this operation.

data.name: MenuId.BodyOfRevolution
data.label: Body of revolution
data.info: Make this path a body of revolution.

data.name: MenuId.BodyOfRevolution.Count
data.label: {0} bodies of revolution
data.info: Select one of several possible bodies of revolution.

data.name: MenuId.CircleToSphere
data.label: Sphere
data.info: Create a sphere with the diameter and position of this circle.
